overview:
We are small web designing / development firm offering competitive pricing and personalized / friendly service to our clients. Whether you are small-mid sized company, non-profit organization or individual, we will develop a high quality internet presence for you in the most effective way.

All sites are designed with the right mix to assit you in meeting your goals while maintaining ease of navigation, cross browser compatibility and optimization for quick loading.

Browse our Portfolio for additional information and see how ePowerlanka can help you achive your online goal.
